D I J L S 

D

destroy() - Static method in class jatoo.log4j.Log4jUtils
Release all the resources.

I

init() - Static method in class jatoo.log4j.Log4jUtils
Initializes Log4J with the logs folder created in the working directory (where the JVM is started).
init(File) - Static method in class jatoo.log4j.Log4jUtils
Initializes Log4J with the logs folder created in the specified folder.
init(File, File) - Static method in class jatoo.log4j.Log4jUtils
Initializes Log4J with the logs folder created in the specified folder, trying to search for new properties or loggers in the second specified folder.
isInitialized() - Static method in class jatoo.log4j.Log4jUtils
 

J

jatoo.log4j - package jatoo.log4j
A Java Open Source library created to ease the work with Apache Log4j™ logging library.

L

Log4jUtils - Class in jatoo.log4j
A collection of utility methods to ease the work with Apache Log4j™ logging library.

S

SYSTEM_PROPERTY_LOGS_FOLDER - Static variable in class jatoo.log4j.Log4jUtils
The logs folder parameter used in configuration files.
